name: DRONE-UP
description:
DRONE-UP is a 2D side-scrolling game where the main character is a drone. 

The main goal of this game is to fly your drone from the take off point to the landing point. There are several challenges in this game, the character must not crash into anything but the take off point and the landing point.

The drone can be controlled using Arrow Button on your keyboard.

Controls:

No gravity controls (Level 3):

  • Arrow Up = Move Up
  • Arrow Down = Move Down
  • Arrow Left = Move Left
  • Arrow Right = Move Right
  • Esc = Back to Main Menu

Gravity (Level 1 & 2):

  • Arrow Up = Thrust
  • Arrow Left = Move Left
  • Arrow Right = Move Right
  • Esc = Back to Main Menu

Created by Jose Devian Hibono for 1-Week Game Jam by CSUI Game Development Course

Gitlab Link: https://gitlab.com/josedevian/game-jam

Some assets downloaded from:

  • Spritesheets taken from kenneyplatformerpack
  • Fonts taken from dafont.com
  • Drone Character made by Nikita Golubev from <a href="https://www.flaticon.com/"  ="" title="Flaticon"></a>www.flaticon.com

  • Menu Screen Background taken from https://anokolisa.itch.io/legacy-adventure-pack
